org.intermine.bio.util

Class OrganismRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.intermine.bio.util.OrganismRepository

  • public final class OrganismRepository
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to hold information about organisms.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      OrganismData getOrganismDataByAbbreviation(java.lang.String abbreviation)
      Look up OrganismData objects by abbreviation, abbreviations are not case sensitive.
      OrganismData getOrganismDataByFullName(java.lang.String fullName)
      Look up OrganismData objects by a full name that is genus species.
      OrganismData getOrganismDataByGenusSpecies(java.lang.String genus, java.lang.String species)
      Look up OrganismData objects by genus and species - both must match.
      OrganismData getOrganismDataByShortName(java.lang.String shortName)
      Look up OrganismData objects by shortName, short names are case sensitive.
      OrganismData getOrganismDataByTaxon(int taxonId)
      Look up OrganismData objects by taxon id.
      OrganismData getOrganismDataByTaxonInternal(int taxonId)
      Look up OrganismData objects by taxon id.
      static OrganismData getOrganismDataByUniprot(java.lang.String abbreviation)
      Look up OrganismData objects by Uniprot abbreviation, eg HUMAN or DROME.
      static OrganismRepository getOrganismRepository()
      Return an OrganismRepository created from a properties file in the class path.
      java.lang.String getStrain(java.lang.String taxonString)
      Get strains for given taxon ID

    • Method Detail

      • getOrganismRepository

        public static OrganismRepository getOrganismRepository()
        Return an OrganismRepository created from a properties file in the class path.
        Returns:
        the OrganismRepository

      • getOrganismDataByTaxonInternal

        public OrganismData getOrganismDataByTaxonInternal(int taxonId)
        Look up OrganismData objects by taxon id. Create and return a new OrganismData object if there is no existing one.
        Parameters:
        taxonId - the taxon id
        Returns:
        the OrganismData

      • getOrganismDataByTaxon

        public OrganismData getOrganismDataByTaxon(int taxonId)
        Look up OrganismData objects by taxon id. If there is no taxon, look in strains. Return null if there is no such organism.
        Parameters:
        taxonId - the taxon id
        Returns:
        the OrganismData

      • getOrganismDataByAbbreviation

        public OrganismData getOrganismDataByAbbreviation(java.lang.String abbreviation)
        Look up OrganismData objects by abbreviation, abbreviations are not case sensitive. Return null if there is no such organism.
        Parameters:
        abbreviation - the abbreviation
        Returns:
        the OrganismData

      • getOrganismDataByShortName

        public OrganismData getOrganismDataByShortName(java.lang.String shortName)
        Look up OrganismData objects by shortName, short names are case sensitive. Return null if there is no such organism.
        Parameters:
        shortName - the short name. e.g. "H. sapiens"
        Returns:
        the OrganismData

      • getOrganismDataByGenusSpecies

        public OrganismData getOrganismDataByGenusSpecies(java.lang.String genus,
                                         java.lang.String species)
        Look up OrganismData objects by genus and species - both must match. Returns null if there is no OrganismData in this OrganismRepository that matches.
        Parameters:
        genus - the genus
        species - the species
        Returns:
        the OrganismData

      • getOrganismDataByUniprot

        public static OrganismData getOrganismDataByUniprot(java.lang.String abbreviation)
        Look up OrganismData objects by Uniprot abbreviation, eg HUMAN or DROME. Returns null if there is no OrganismData in this OrganismRepository that matches.
        Parameters:
        abbreviation - the UniProt abbreviation, eg. HUMAN or DROME
        Returns:
        the OrganismData

      • getOrganismDataByFullName

        public OrganismData getOrganismDataByFullName(java.lang.String fullName)
        Look up OrganismData objects by a full name that is genus species. Returns null if there is no OrganismData in this OrganismRepository that matches.
        Parameters:
        fullName - the genus and species separated by a space
        Returns:
        the OrganismData

      • getStrain

        public java.lang.String getStrain(java.lang.String taxonString)
        Get strains for given taxon ID
        Parameters:
        taxonString - taxon ID for organism
        Returns:
        taxonId for strain
